column2: The stark inclines of the peak tested your footing at every step. Having finlay reached the summit"," you find the entrace","

This mount had not been kind. The wind bellowed with the power of someone wanting to knock you astray from your course and onto the crags below. The wolves had scattered and in place their prey dotted your ascension. Who those men were was a mystery"," yet what they gave their lives for sat in front of you;
